settings.title: The beginning
settings.text: Out of millions of nude photographies in the world, what makes one unique? To answer this, we decided to build our own collection. So Unceil was born - at the crossroads of bold and subtlety. We curate in the balance of risqué and pure innocence, a refined beauty and untamed wildness.

settings.title: Democratising the art scene
settings.text: We support artists who want to represent themselves, instead of represented. Not exclusive, anybody who can present quality fine art photography that is aligned with Unceil’s direction can list their artwork here. Decentralised, open gallery that has no old-school restrictions and limitations.

settings.title: Support independent artists
settings.text: Unceil is dedicated to promoting and celebrating independent artists, recognizing the visionary work that emerges from their unique perspectives. We believe that creativity should not be limited by traditional boundaries, and we work tirelessly to give artists the freedom and support they need to create. We are committed to nurturing creativity and promoting the untamed beauty of the natural world, and we are honored to do so alongside some of the most talented and independent artists in the world. At Unceil, we celebrate independent artists and the unique vision they bring to the world of fine art photography.

settings.title: Breaking boundaries
settings.text: Unceil is more than just an online platform; it's a visionary space that transcends the boundaries of traditional art galleries. By bringing artists and collectors closer together, Unceil celebrates the untamed beauty of the natural world and inspires creativity and connection. Through its commitment to innovation and passion for art, Unceil is redefining what it means to distribute art in a digital age. Accessible to all, Unceil is breaking down the barriers that once separated artists from their audiences, creating a world where art can be appreciated and celebrated by all.

settings.title: Unceil is a balance of risqué, pure innocence, and untamed wildness
settings.text: No disguise, just bare skin - nudity puts things into perspective. It makes us aware of how small and finite we are, living in the vast expanse of time and space. I simultaneously feel tiny but also a part of something bigger. This sense of insignificance, yet connectedness, is such a humbling yet liberating experience. My passion is to share this with the world through photography.
settings.name: Megan Lee
